Dynamics¶

dynamics.compute_multiscalar_profile(gdf[, …])

Compute multiscalar segregation profile.

Batch Computation¶

batch.batch_compute_singlegroup(gdf, …)

Batch compute single-group indices.

batch.batch_compute_multigroup(gdf, groups, …)

Batch compute multi-group indices.

batch.batch_multiscalar_singlegroup(gdf, …)

Batch compute multiscalar profiles for single-group indices.

batch.batch_multiscalar_multigroup(gdf, …)

Batch compute multiscalar profiles for multi-group indices.

Inference¶

inference.SingleValueTest(seg_class[, …])

Perform inference for a single segregation measure

inference.TwoValueTest(seg_class_1, seg_class_2)

Perform inference comparison for a two segregation measures

Decomposition¶

decomposition.DecomposeSegregation(index1, …)

Decompose segregation differences into spatial and attribute components.
